long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search Wiki! - Your Knowledge Hub in Every New Tab!
Transform your new tab into a gateway to knowledge with Search Wiki!. This Chrome extension allows you to quickly look up anything on Wikipedia directly from your new tab. Whether you're curious about historical events, scientific concepts, or the latest trends, Search Wiki! puts the world's largest online encyclopedia at your fingertips.

Key Features:
- Instant Wikipedia Access: Search for any topic on Wikipedia right from your new tab.
- Clean and Intuitive Interface: Enjoy a clutter-free experience with easy navigation and instant results.
- Enhanced Search Provider: Your new tab search will be powered by Microsoft Bing, ensuring you get the best search results.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I agree to install the Search Wiki! Chrome extension and set my new tab search to be powered by Bing, as described in "Search Wiki!" Chrome extension Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
